(A47 → (¬(A45 → (A21 → A22)) → A46)).natural: If research continuation is approved for the project, then under the condition that it is not the case that if the drainage system is optimal in field A then if soil moisture is optimal in field A then plant growth is robust for corn, infrastructure upgrade is needed for field A.

(A5 → (A1 → ¬A2)).natural: Provided that a frost period occurs in winter, then if fertilizer is effective for corn, it is not the case that pesticide is effective for corn.

(A50 → ¬A49).natural: If new funding is sourced for the project, then it is not the case that crop failure has occurred in field A.

(A6 ∨ G).natural: Either the irrigation system is functional in field A or government support is available for agriculture.

(A7 → A8).natural: Whenever the soil test has passed for field A, nutrients are balanced in field A.

(A7 → ¬A8).natural: If the soil test has passed for field A, then it is not the case that nutrients are balanced in field A.

(A7 ∨ ¬A6).natural: Either the soil test has passed for field A or it is not the case that the irrigation system is functional in field A.

(¬(A14 ∨ A15) → A16).natural: Provided that it is not the case that either manual harvest is approved for field A or mechanical harvest is approved for field A, the harvest is delayed in field A.

(¬(A21 → A22) → A49).natural: If it is not the case that if soil moisture is optimal in field A then plant growth is robust for corn, then crop failure has occurred in field A.

(¬(A3 → (A1 → ¬A2)) → A24).natural: Whenever it is not the case that if a drought period occurs in summer then if fertilizer is effective for corn then it is not the case that pesticide is effective for corn, the research paper is published for the study.

(¬(A45 → (A21 → A22)) → A46).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the drainage system is optimal in field A then if soil moisture is optimal in field A then plant growth is robust for corn, infrastructure upgrade is needed for field A.

(¬(A7 → A8) → A9).natural: If it is not the case that if the soil test has passed for field A then nutrients are balanced in field A, then soil remediation is needed for field A.

(¬A47 → A48).natural: Provided that it is not the case that research continuation is approved for the project, research modification is required for the project.

(¬A47 → ¬A48).natural: If it is not the case that research continuation is approved for the project, then it is not the case that research modification is required for the project.

(¬G → A1).natural: Whenever government support is not available for agriculture, fertilizer is effective for corn.

(¬G → A12).natural: Under the condition that government support is not available for agriculture, crop rotation is complete in field A.

(¬G → A19).natural: If government support is not available for agriculture, then crop yield is high in field A.

(¬G → A20).natural: Provided that government support is not available for agriculture, the weather is optimal in summer.

(¬G → ¬A12).natural: If government support is not available for agriculture, then it is not the case that crop rotation is complete in field A.

A18.natural: The grant is approved for the project.

A25.natural: The field trial is successful in field A.

A31.natural: The research proposal is approved for the study.

A32.natural: Ethics committee approval is granted for the study.

A47.natural: Research continuation is approved for the project.

A50.natural: New funding is sourced for the project.

G.natural: Government support is available for agriculture.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that fertilizer is effective for corn.

¬A13.natural: It is not the case that the harvest was successful in field A.

¬A16.natural: It is not the case that the harvest is delayed in field A.

¬A17.natural: It is not the case that funding is secured for the project.

¬A19.natural: It is not the case that crop yield is high in field A.

¬A24.natural: It is not the case that the research paper is published for the study.

¬A26.natural: It is not the case that the lab results are positive for the soil samples.

¬A37.natural: It is not the case that disease resistance is high for corn.

¬A46.natural: It is not the case that infrastructure upgrade is needed for field A.

¬A49.natural: It is not the case that crop failure has occurred in field A.

¬A6.natural: It is not the case that the irrigation system is functional in field A.

¬A7.natural: It is not the case that the soil test has passed for field A.

¬A9.natural: It is not the case that soil remediation is needed for field A.
